name: Notion Study Scheduler - Basic
description: The perfect study companion for organizing and staying on top of your study schedule. Designed for simplicity and with evidence-based theory so you can enjoy school with peace of mind :) Template includes : Integrated calendar to track ongoing classes and assignments Powerful review system to track confidence levels for each topic Minimalistic weekly planner Simple daily to-do list Simple mood tracker
features: Integrated calendar to track ongoing classes and assignments; Powerful review system to track confidence levels for each topic; Minimalistic weekly planner; Simple daily to-do list; Simple mood tracker
